title: Watch a podcast discussion about Gemini 3 and the future of Search.
description: Learn how Gemini 3 powers Google Search with Generative UI, Nano Banana, and interactive graphics.

title: Gemini 3 Flash: frontier intelligence built for speed
author: Tulsee Doshi
description: Gemini 3 Flash offers frontier intelligence built for speed at a fraction of the cost.

title: The latest AI news we announced in November
author: Keyword Team
description: Here are Google’s latest AI updates from November 2025

title: Watch ‘The Thinking Game,’ a documentary about Google DeepMind, for free on YouTube.
description: We’re bringing “The Thinking Game" to the Google DeepMind YouTube channel.

title: How we’re bringing AI image verification to the Gemini app
author: Laurie Richardson
description: Our new Gemini app feature allows you to verify Google AI images and determine whether content was created or edited by AI.

title: Google DeepMind is opening a new AI research lab in Singapore to advance AI in Asia Pacific.
A new era of intelligence with Gemini 3
author: Koray Kavukcuoglu
description: Today we’re releasing Gemini 3 – our most intelligent model that helps you bring any idea to life.

title: WeatherNext 2: Our most advanced weather forecasting model
author: The WeatherNext team
description: The new AI model delivers more efficient, more accurate and higher-resolution global weather predictions.

title: Gen AI is bringing New Yorkers' imagination to life
author: Matthieu Kim Lorrain
description: ‘Imagine If…’ lets New Yorkers submit artistic visions of New York City and see them brought to life my local artists.

title: How AI is giving Northern Ireland teachers time back
author: Lila Ibrahim
description: A six-month long pilot program with the Northern Ireland Education Authority’s C2k initiative found that integrating Gemini and other generative AI tools saved participating teachers an average of 10 hours per week.

title: Listen to the Brazilian rainforests and help contribute to AI research
author: Marconi Campos
description: Google Arts & Culture is launching a new Nature & AI experiment that invites people everywhere to listen to the sounds of the Brazilian rainforests to help monitor their biodiversity health

title: The latest AI news we announced in October
author: Keyword Team
description: Here are Google’s latest AI updates from October 2025

title: Accelerating discovery with the AI for Math Initiative
author: Eugénie Rives
description: The AI for Math Initiative brings together five of the world's most prestigious research institutions.

title: Introducing Veo 3.1 and advanced capabilities in Flow
author: Thomas Iljic
description: Today, we’re introducing new and enhanced creative capabilities to edit your clips.

title: The latest AI news we announced in September
author: Keyword Team
description: Here are Google’s latest AI updates from September 2025

title: Introducing the Gemini 2.5 Computer Use model
author: Google DeepMind
description: Today we are releasing the Gemini 2.5 Computer Use model via the API, which outperforms leading alternatives at browser and mobile tasks.

title: How we’re securing the AI frontier
author: Four Flynn
description: An overview of Google’s cohesive strategy for securing the AI ecosystem from the inside out.

title: From sketches to prototype: Designing with generative AI
author: Ishaan Malhi
description: Google DeepMind collaborated with designer Ross Lovegrove and design office Modem.

title: Gemini achieved gold-medal performance at the International Collegiate Programming Contest World Finals.
author: TK Breuer
description: Gemini achieves gold status at the ICPC, marking a new leap in AI's abstract problem-solving.

title: Listen to a discussion on how AI can power scientific breakthroughs.
description: Pushmeet Kohli, who leads DeepMind’s science and strategic initiatives team, discusses AI and science.

title: 10 examples of our new native image editing in the Gemini app
author: TK Breuer
description: A new Google DeepMind image editing model, fondly known as Nano Banana, is now in the Gemini app, giving you more creative control to blend and edit photos.

title: The latest AI news we announced in August
author: Keyword Team
description: Here are Google’s latest AI updates from August 2025

title: Hear Google DeepMind CEO Demis Hassabis discuss how world model capabilities are helping AI understand reality.
author: TK Breuer
description: Google DeepMind CEO Demis Hassabis talks about AI’s momentum, from new models to the Game Arena benchmark.

title: The AI model Perch, updated today, uses audio to help protect endangered species.
author: TK Breuer
description: Our Perch AI model helps conservationists analyze bioacoustic data to protect endangered species like birds and coral reefs.

title: The latest AI news we announced in July
author: Keyword Team
description: Here are Google’s latest AI updates from July 2025

title: How we’re using AI to help track and predict cyclones
author: Joel Meares
description: We’re partnering with the National Hurricane Center, supporting their forecasts and warnings this cyclone season.

title: Rethinking how we measure AI intelligence
author: Meg Risdal
description: Kaggle Game Arena is a new platform where AI models compete head-to-head in complex strategic games.

title: Try Deep Think in the Gemini app
author: The Deep Think team
description: Deep Think utilizes extended, parallel thinking and novel reinforcement learning techniques for significantly improved problem-solving.

title: Listen to a conversation about the newest AI capabilities in Search.
Google DeepMind’s new AI model helps historians interpret ancient texts.
author: TK Breuer
description: Aeneas, a new AI model, helps historians interpret, attribute and restore ancient inscriptions.
